It's not a goddamn trojan, people.

Keygens and cracks are almost always detected as threats by almost any antivirus software because that's how they work.

The number of people who think so many torrents are infected because they trust what their protection has to say about the crack simply astounds me.

Of course it's detected as a threat: it's fucking cracking the DRM. What you have to do is some thinking for yourself, for a change.
